require('../info/ini_get')('locutus.sortByReference') : undefined) || 'on' sortByReference = iniVal === 'on' populateArr = sortByReference ? inputArr : populateArr for (i = 0; i < valArr.length; i++) { // Repopulate the old array populateArr[i] = valArr[i] } return sortByReference || populateArr } {% endcodeblock %}
